title: Save exchanged and not exchanged data to storage.
body: e.g.  node reference, A -> B will be 1->2 or 1->10.0.0.1

title: Optimize the entry span’s operationName
body:
I prepare this for the url, which includes the parameters, like some Spring controllers always did, except for me :( . e.g. `/order/save/{orderId}`.

When I want to capture a tomcat service with that style url, the operationName actually is `/order/save/OHXXXXX123`. But this url changes in every saving order operation. As changing happens, the dictionary/encoding mechanism didn't work, even cost more memory.

So I ask for supporting Spring plugin. #282 

But the agent core decided whether the  dictionary/encoding works or not, when creating `TracingContext#createEntrySpan`. So the actual url is still asked for encoding. 

I use this pr to fix this.

title: Just component finish the exchange coding.
body:
1. Use guava cache to support id name exchange.
2. Add abstract ExchangeWorker to aggregate the data wait to exchange.
3. Once per second, timer call the implementation work of ExchangeWorker to exchange.
4. Exchanged data send to AggregationWorker, the data exchange 10 times but not exchanged, then give up.

title: Fixed #327.
body:
When collector server restart at short intervals that zookeeper will not find remove this server path.
But in another situation, there was a same address server has been running, the restart server could not remove this path and recreate it.
So when this situation happened, throw exception to stop this restart server.

title: Feature/266 collector support modularization development
body:
1.  cluster nodes managed by multiple module, such as h2(collector started in stand-alone mode),  zookeeper or redis (collector started in cluster mode)
2. multiple storage implementation, such as h2(collector started in stand-alone mode) or elasticsearch.
3. multiple embedded queue implementation, such as disruptor or datacarrier.

title: Provide a new id generation and serialization mechanism
body:
Use three long to represent the trace segment id, and global trace id.

This is the official comments:
* Generate a new id, combined by three long numbers.

1. The first one represents application instance id. (most likely just an integer value, would be helpful in protobuf)
1. The second one represents thread id. (most likely just an integer value, would be helpful in protobuf)
1. The third one also has two parts
     1. a timestamp, measured in milliseconds
     2. a seq, in current thread, between 0(included) and 9999(included)

Fix NullPointerException when deserialize tags of span
body: If `Span` does not have `tagsWithBool` , the serialization data does not contain `tagsWithBool` data, and the collector does not initialize the` tagsWithBool` field during deserialize, and it will cause NullPointerException when operation `tagsWithBool` field.

title: Improving agent
body:
~~This pull request is working in progress.~~

Right now, I intend to improve the agent in these ways:
1. Remove the three maps of tag. This is be benifit for reducing cost and gc.
1. Ignore request with certain suffix, such as: .css, .js, .png, etc.
1. (Uncerntain yet)Adjust sampling mechanism for better performance. The new is: all segments are sampled, which changes to unsampled, iff 1) sampling is on, and first time trigger sample mechanism, 2) at least one extract completed or tag a span as client, 3) no segment-refs.

title: add feign default http plugin
body:
Feign provide default http client implementation with java.net.HttpURLConnection when run in default mode.
This is a plugin for intercept the default implementation of http calls by the Feign

Feign default http client Plugin Contribution
Link: /sky-walking/apm-sniffer/apm-sdk-plugin/feign-default-http-9.x-plugin/
Supported Version: feign-9.x
I have tested based on version 9.5.0，it can work.
### trace DAG
![tracedag](https://sky-walking.github.io/page-resources/3.1/feign-default-http-plugin/tracedag.png)

### trace stack
![tracestack](https://sky-walking.github.io/page-resources/3.1/feign-default-http-plugin/tracestack.png)

### span infomation
![spaninfo](https://sky-walking.github.io/page-resources/3.1/feign-default-http-plugin/spaninfo.png)

#160

title: Prototype codes of supporting leaf span
add okhttp plugin(provide synchronous http calls )
body:
OKhttp provide synchronous and asynchronous calls. 
This is a okhttp plugin, just intercept synchronous calls. 

OKhttp Plugin Contribution
Link: /sky-walking/apm-sniffer/apm-sdk-plugin/http-plugin/okhttp-3.x-plugin/
Supported Version: okhttp-3.X.X
I have tested based on version  okhttp-3.7.0，it can work.

### trace DAG
![tracedag](https://sky-walking.github.io/page-resources/3.1/okhttp-plugin/tracedag.png)

### trace stack
![tracestack](https://sky-walking.github.io/page-resources/3.1/okhttp-plugin/tracestack.png)

### span infomation
![spaninfo](https://sky-walking.github.io/page-resources/3.1/okhttp-plugin/spaninfo.png)

#160

@bai-yang I think you are interested in this.

cc @sky-walking

 - Hostname, ipv4, ipv6 tags are not supported. Related #169
 - Inject and extract fail when using binary-map. Related #167
 - Peer.port is type of short, in some version of ot. Done in prev commits.
 - Refactor codes about inject and extract when using text-map. #167
 - Change context head-name to sw3. Lower case and shorter are better.
